flawed_nl_solution:
At least one person lives in 17/20 * 120 = <<17/20*120=2400/17>>2400/17 apartments.
At least two persons live in 3/5 * 120 = <<3/5*120=72>>72 apartments.
So in every of the 2400/17 - 72 = <<1176/17*1=1176/17>>1176/17 apartments, only one person is living.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 102, not 2400/17. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
